link.script: /* CSS Browser Selector v0.4.0 (Nov 02, 2010) Can apply styles to specific browsers, this js adds a class to body tag based on browser Rafael Lima (http://rafael.adm.br) http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.5/ Contributors: http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector#contributors */ function css_browser_selector(u) { var ua = u.toLowerCase(), is = function (t) { return ua.indexOf(t) > -1 }, g = 'gecko', w = 'webkit', s = 'safari', o = 'opera', m = 'mobile', h = document.documentElement, b = [(!(/opera|webtv/i.test(ua)) && /msie\s(\d)/.test(ua)) ? ('ie ie' + RegExp.$1) : is('firefox/2') ? g + ' ff2' : is('firefox/3.5') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_5' : is('firefox/3.6') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_6' : is('firefox/3') ? g + ' ff3' : is('gecko/') ? g : is('opera') ? o + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$1 : (/opera(\s|\/)(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$2 : '')) : is('konqueror') ? 'konqueror' : is('blackberry') ? m + ' blackberry' : is('android') ? m + ' android' : is('chrome') ? w + ' chrome' : is('iron') ? w + ' iron' : is('applewebkit/') ? w + ' ' + s + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + s + RegExp.$1 : '') : is('mozilla/') ? g : '', is('j2me') ? m + ' j2me' : is('iphone') ? m + ' iphone' : is('ipod') ? m + ' ipod' : is('ipad') ? m + ' ipad' : is('mac') ? 'mac' : is('darwin') ? 'mac' : is('webtv') ? 'webtv' : is('win') ? 'win' + (is('windows nt 6.0') ? ' vista' : '') : is('freebsd') ? 'freebsd' : (is('x11') || is('linux')) ? 'linux' : '', 'js']; c = b.join(' '); h.className += ' ' + c; return c; }; css_browser_selector(navigator.userAgent);

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.h2: Updated Information Regarding the Extended School Closure

div.span: Updates about graduation are included in Dr. Willingham's family letter

span.style: color: #454b51; font-family: monsal-gothic, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: #ffffff

span.span: The Midview Staff Parade will take place on Friday, April 24, beginning at 12:00PM. Click Read More to view the three different routes staff will take.

div.span: School closure and event updates are included in Dr. Willingham's most recent letter to families
Dr. Willingham's most recent letter outlines updates to the Flexible Learning Plan and provides links to a variety of resources to help support families

h3.a: Letter to Families - April 9 Good Friday and Easter Update

div.span: Dr. Willingham provides information regarding facility closure and helpful links to help support student learning. Please make sure to stay in contact with your child's teacher and principal for more information.

The letter from Dr. Willingham includes information about pick-up procedures for the work completed during the first three weeks of the school closure, the census, and contact information for our counselors, social workers, and prevention counselor.
Read Dr. Willingham's latest letter regarding Governor DeWine's announcement to extend the school closure until at least April 30.
Read the most recent letter from Dr. Willingham regarding our district online flexible learning plan and Chromebook distribution

h3.a: All District Athletic Facilities Now Closed

div.span: Action taken to comply with Governor's Stay at Home order.

h3.a: Midview Technology Survey to Parents - March 20

div.span: Please read the letter from Dr. Willingham. Complete the survey included within by Monday, March 30, to help us ensure we are prepared in the event school is closed past April 3.
Please see the letter Dr. Willingham shared with families on March 16 regarding the school closure, accessing student work, and food distribution options.

h3.a: Food Services Update as of March 16

div.span: The Midview Local Schools will continue to provide breakfast and lunch for our students starting on Tuesday, March 17, 2020, and will continue on Mondays and Wednesdays throughout the duration of this extended time off from school. For more information about our food distribution plan, please click Read More+

span.div: Please visit each building's webpage to access the Flexible Learning Plan for your child's grade level and/or teacher. Additional information regarding pick-up of hard copies is also included.

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'PDF', 'Download', 'Gifted and Talented Enrichment Support Resources');
